name: Gothenburg Exhibition of Fine Arts
obverse: Front view of the Gothenburg elementary school house where the exhibition was held.
reverse: Gothenburg's coat of arms with lion facing left under the royal crown.
description: This was the first of four art exhibitions that were held in Gothenburg, Sweden. Artists from Sweden, Norway, and Denmark attended. The next three exhibitions were held in 1881, 1886, and 1896.
